Author: lpot315
Text: Haha yeah that’s true. I wish they were much more easy to talk about. But since it isn’t...that’s why we have this. & granted we don’t really know each other, it’s easy to connect on this deep of a level. I have 1 friend that I can openly talk to about this bc she deals with it too...but it doesn’t compare to this community at all.

Author: sigvi
Text: My sister had the same reaction when I told her about the community. I think it’s hard for them to understand since they haven’t experienced ED behaviors, but all of us know what a relief it is to come here after something makes you feel like shit and you need to feel like you’re not alone.   I guess from an outside perspective it sounds a bit crazy when you try to describe “an online community where we all talk about our eating disorders” in a good way lol
